caption.p: The fermentative performances of the Aurantiochytrium sp. strains No. 6 and No. 32 for lipid and carbohydrate productions under FT-IR monitoring. ( A), lipid and DHA production by Aurantiochytrium sp. strains No. 6; ( B), carbohydrate production by Aurantiochytrium sp. strains No. 32. Reducing sugar, filled squares; biomass, filled inverted triangles; lipid content, filled circles; lipid yield, filled triangles; carbohydrate content, filled diamonds; carbohydrate yield, open diamonds.
